SummaryEnglish: Grand Blues!, the official 4-koma manga for Cygames's Granblue Fantasy, gets a short anime adaptation! Set in the grand blue skies up above, the depths of darkness, elder sisters, knights, gentlemen, Vyrn loversâ€• all the colorful crew members will get to shine in a whole new light! "Kept you waiting, huh? It's time for you to see our final forms!" Join us and take flight to the world in the skies!

1.SummaryEnglish: The crew heads out on a monster hunting quest, and Lyria and Vyrn must come together to fight off the enemy!

2.SummaryEnglish: Vyrn kills some time, Jeanne receives an invitation, Hallessena spots an unusual training method, and Rackam sees something he'd rather forget.

3.SummaryEnglish: Lily and the gunsmith sisters take center stage this episode.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Heave-Ho Trio star in this episode, as they contend with the Revenge of the Bonito.

5.SummaryEnglish: Lunalu has a deadline to meet and enlists the help of the crew to make it. Will she be able to finish in time, and will she manage to sell any copies?

6.SummaryEnglish: Rosetta has joined the maidens of Xochitl for a concert!

7.SummaryEnglish: Narmaya and the rest of the big sister gang come together to have discussions, heal one of their own, and even perform a conversion ritual!

8.SummaryEnglish: The knights have arrived! But walls stand in their way...

9.SummaryEnglish: The members of the Society, Zeta, Vaseraga, Beatrix, and Eustace are the focus of this episode.

10.SummaryEnglish: Owen, Morphe, and Phoebe look into Grea and Lecia's dreams, only to find their imagination running wild!

11.SummaryEnglish: The primarchs take the spotlight as the crew approaches the climactic moments of 000.

12.TitleEnglish: A Final Battle to Shake Off Your Blues!
12.SummaryEnglish: Vyrn wakes up in an interdimensional pocket, where another Vyrn appears as a challenger!
